newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish police break cocaine ring, arrest 15.
newsitem.headline: Spanish police break cocaine ring, arrest 15.

text.p: Spanish police said on Monday they had seized 750 kilos of cocaine during a raid near Barcelona and arrested 15 people suspected of being involved in a huge drug ring operating in Spain.
Police said they found the drugs in a farmhouse in Tordera, just north of Barcelona, but made the arrests throughout the country.
Among those arrested were two Colombians who police believe may have been linked to Colombia's Cali cartel.
Police seized 700 kilos of cocaine in northern Spain earlier this month and arrested nine people, including two Colombians also suspected of having connections to the Cali cartel.
